title: 12-year-old boy fatally shot self while looking at gun; death accidental: Coroner
content:
A 12-year-old York boy accidentally shot himself while looking at a gun, according to a ruling from the York County coroner's office.
Marlin Banks Jr. died Sunday morning at York Hospital, about 35 minutes after he was shot around 7:35 a.m. at his home on Richland Avenue in the city. The boy suffered a fatal gunshot wound to his head in the incident, according to the office.
City police are continuing to investigate the incident.
